keywords.value: REVIEWS AND OTHER DATA ON SPECIFIC PRODUCTIONS

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAVING HOME-David French's drama about a mother, father and two sons locked in intra-family warfare. Directed by Charles Maryan. At the Riverside Church. Opens Tuesday. LOVE FOR LOVE-The opening production of the New Phoenix Repertory season is William Congreve's 1695 Restoration comedy-romance. Mary Ure and John McMartin head the cast, under the direction of Harold Prince. Opens Monday at the Helen Hayes.
